description:
A collection of stand-alone prose stories that focus on fierce female characters from the world of http://anidb.net/a69 [One Piece].
Go behind the runway as style icon http://anidb.net/ch476 [Nami] stars in a life-changing fashion show, observe wise http://anidb.net/ch488 [Robin] as she helps to decipher an ancient tablet with http://anidb.net/ch43081 [Koala] and http://anidb.net/ch69929 [Sabo], watch as solemn http://anidb.net/ch2940 [Princess Vivi] receives a love letter from an unexpected admirer, and check out http://anidb.net/ch3600 [Ghost Princess Perona]`s battle over the last bottle of wine with http://anidb.net/ch475 [Zoro] and http://anidb.net/ch3840 [Mihawk]!
Source: Viz
